sentence.Network_en: A stiff knee following surgery forced her to walk with a limp.

sentence.Network_cn: 这种外科手术甚至可以用来切除癌性肿瘤。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French surgerie, contraction of serurgerie, from serurgien (see surgeon)

entry.def: Surgery is medical treatment in which someone's body is cut open so that a doctor can repair, remove, or replace a diseased or damaged part.

example.ex: His father has just recovered from heart surgery...
example.tran: 他父亲刚刚从心脏外科手术中康复过来。

example.ex: Mr Clark underwent five hours of emergency surgery.
example.tran: 克拉克先生经受了 5 个小时的外科急救手术。

entry.def: A surgery is the room or house where a doctor or dentist works.

example.ex: Bill was in the doctor's surgery demanding to know what was wrong with him.
example.tran: 比尔在医生的诊疗室里想要知道自己到底得了什么病。

entry.def: A doctor's surgery is the period of time each day when a doctor sees patients at his or her surgery.

example.ex: His surgery always ends at eleven.
example.tran: 他的出诊时间总是到11点结束。

entry.def: In Britain, when someone such as an MP or a local councillor holds a surgery, they go to an office where members of the public can come and talk to them about problems or issues that concern them.
A surgery is the room in a hospital where surgeons operate on their patients.

means.word_mean: 1. the branch of medical science that treats disease or injury by operative procedures;

sentences.sentence: "he is professor of surgery at the Harvard Medical School"

means.word_mean: 2. a room where a doctor or dentist can be consulted;

sentences.sentence: "he read the warning in the doctor's surgery"

means.word_mean: 3. a room in a hospital equipped for the performance of surgical operations;

sentences.sentence: "great care is taken to keep the operating rooms aseptic"

means.word_mean: 4. a medical procedure involving an incision with instruments; performed to repair damage or arrest disease in a living body;

sentences.sentence: "they will schedule the operation as soon as an operating room is available"

Sentence.sentence: In many cases, screening can lead to surgeries to remove cancer, while the cancers themselves may be slow-growing and may not pose serious health problems in patients' remaining years.
It is a major achievement in eye surgery.
They take less time to perform a surgery.

sentences.en: Your condition is serious and requires surgery.
sentences.cn: 你的情况很严重, 需要动外科手术。

sentences.en: He saw the poster in the doctor's surgery.
sentences.cn: 他在那位医生的外科诊所里看到了这张海报。
